omikuji.text_jp: 望み事：叶う。努力を怠らず、時来れば成就す。待人：来る。失せ物：出る。旅立ち：吉。商売：利あり。学問：精進せよ。病気：回復する。
omikuji.text_en: Wish: It will come true. Keep working diligently; when the time comes it will be fulfilled. Visitor: will arrive. Lost item: will be found. Travel: auspicious. Business: profitable. Studies: persevere. Illness: recovery.

omikuji.text_jp: 総合運：吉事多し。家庭円満、交際運良好。新しきこと始めよ。困難はやがて消ゆ。
omikuji.text_en: Overall: Many auspicious events. Family harmony and favorable relationships. Begin something new. Difficulties will soon disappear.

omikuji.text_jp: 願望：叶うが、己の心の準備を忘れずに。恋愛：誠実ならば実る。金運：臨時の幸運有り。
omikuji.text_en: Desire: Will be granted, but don't forget to prepare your heart. Love: will bear fruit if sincere. Finances: unexpected luck may come.

omikuji.text_jp: 物事はゆっくり進むが確実。争いを避け、和を重んじよ。転居・転職は慎重に。
omikuji.text_en: Things progress slowly but surely. Avoid conflict and value harmony. Be cautious about moving or changing jobs.

omikuji.text_jp: 他人の助けあり。感謝の心を忘れずに。急がず腐らず。健康は良好。
omikuji.text_en: Help from others will come. Do not forget gratitude. Don't rush or despair. Health is good.

omikuji.text_jp: 小さな幸運が積み重なる。用心深く振る舞え。投資はほどほどに。
omikuji.text_en: Small fortunes will accumulate. Act prudently. Keep investments moderate.

omikuji.text_jp: 急がば回れ。慎重さが功を奏す。恋は慎み、相手を思いやれ。
omikuji.text_en: If in haste, take a detour. Caution will be rewarded. In love, be reserved and considerate of your partner.

omikuji.text_jp: 今の努力は将来の実になる。焦らず種を育てよ。学びは吉。
omikuji.text_en: Your current efforts will become future results. Nurture the seeds without hurry. Study is auspicious.

omikuji.text_jp: 気づかなかった幸運あり。周囲に目を向けよ。商いは徐々に良くなる。
omikuji.text_en: There is luck you hadn't noticed. Look around you. Business will gradually improve.

omikuji.text_jp: 平穏な運気。家族と友情を大切にせよ。小さな喜びが訪れる。
omikuji.text_en: Calm fortune. Cherish family and friendships. Small joys will come.

omikuji.text_jp: 悩みは軽くなる。相談は吉。遠方より便りあり。金運は平凡。
omikuji.text_en: Worries will lighten. Consulting others is good. News from afar. Finances are average.

omikuji.text_jp: 正直と節度が鍵。迷わず誠実に。争いは避けるべし。
omikuji.text_en: Honesty and moderation are key. Act sincerely. Avoid conflicts.

omikuji.text_jp: 変化を恐れず挑め。環境を変えることで道が開ける。
omikuji.text_en: Don't fear change; take on challenges. Changing your environment will open paths.

omikuji.text_jp: 今は忍耐を要すが、終わり良ければすべて良し。待て。慌てるな。
omikuji.text_en: Now requires patience, but all will be well in the end. Wait. Do not rush.

omikuji.text_jp: 少しずつ吉。蓄えと節約を心がけよ。恋は時間が必要。
omikuji.text_en: Small gains gradually. Practice saving and frugality. Love needs time.

omikuji.text_jp: 心身の調和を大切に。焦りは失策の元。身辺整理を進めよ。
omikuji.text_en: Value harmony of mind and body. Hurry leads to mistakes. Tidy your surroundings.

omikuji.text_jp: 思わぬ災いあり。無理をせず用心深く。争いは大いに損あり。
omikuji.text_en: Unexpected misfortune may occur. Don't overreach; be cautious. Conflicts bring great loss.

omikuji.text_jp: 物事行き詰まる。行いを顧みて改めよ。小さなことも軽んずるな。
omikuji.text_en: Things will stagnate. Reflect on your actions and correct them. Don't dismiss small matters.

omikuji.text_jp: 人間関係に注意。言葉の行き違いに注意せよ。金銭の貸借は避けるべし。
omikuji.text_en: Be careful in relationships. Watch out for misunderstandings. Avoid lending or borrowing money.

omikuji.text_jp: 無理をすれば損す。健康を第一に。重要な決断は延期せよ。
omikuji.text_en: Overreaching brings loss. Prioritize health. Postpone major decisions.

omikuji.text_jp: 暗雲の後に光あり。努力は必ず報われる。恋も仕事も吉。
omikuji.text_en: Light follows dark clouds. Effort will surely be rewarded. Love and work are favored.

omikuji.text_jp: 誠実に振る舞えば運は向く。小さな選択を大切にせよ。
omikuji.text_en: Act sincerely and fortune will turn. Cherish small choices.

omikuji.text_jp: 日々の積み重ねが道を拓く。諦めずに続けよ。交渉は辛抱強く。
omikuji.text_en: Daily accumulation opens the way. Continue without giving up. Be patient in negotiations.

omikuji.text_jp: 縁に恵まれる。新しい出会いは吉。恩返しを怠るな。
omikuji.text_en: You will be blessed with connections. New encounters are auspicious. Do not forget to repay kindness.

omikuji.text_jp: 小さな問題は時間とともに治まる。平常心を保て。
omikuji.text_en: Small troubles will settle with time. Keep calm.

omikuji.text_jp: 信頼できる助けあり。相談すれば道が拓ける。金運は持ち直す。
omikuji.text_en: Reliable help will come. Consulting will open the way. Finances will recover.

omikuji.text_jp: 精神面の成長が大切。学びと読書が吉。新しい趣味を持て。
omikuji.text_en: Mental growth is important. Study and reading are auspicious. Take up a new hobby.

omikuji.text_jp: 小さな兆しを見落とすな。準備が運を呼ぶ。健康維持を心がけよ。
omikuji.text_en: Don't overlook small signs. Preparation attracts fortune. Maintain your health.

omikuji.text_jp: 家庭運良し。身内との相談が物事を好転させる。旅行は楽しめる。
omikuji.text_en: Good family luck. Consult with relatives to improve matters. Travel will be enjoyable.

omikuji.text_jp: 忍耐が次の幸福を呼ぶ。今はじっと耐えよ。無駄な争いは避けること。
omikuji.text_en: Patience will bring future happiness. Endure quietly now. Avoid pointless conflicts.

omikuji.text_jp: 時節が来るのを待て。無理に事を進めるな。金銭は計画的に。
omikuji.text_en: Wait for the season to come. Don't force matters. Manage finances carefully.

omikuji.text_jp: 恋愛・縁結びに特に吉。誠実な心が幸福を呼ぶ。急ぐな、しかし積極的に。
omikuji.text_en: Particularly auspicious for love and matches. A sincere heart brings happiness. Don't rush, but be proactive.

omikuji.text_jp: 学問に吉。継続は力なり。試験は準備が肝心。
omikuji.text_en: Auspicious for studies. Consistency is strength. Preparation is key for exams.

omikuji.text_jp: 用心深さが幸いする。約束は守れ。手続きを怠らずに。
omikuji.text_en: Caution will bring luck. Keep promises. Don't neglect paperwork.

omikuji.text_jp: 心身の疲れが出やすい。無理は禁物。回復には休息が必要。
omikuji.text_en: Mind and body fatigue may surface. Do not overdo it. Rest is needed for recovery.

omikuji.text_jp: 商売は順調。誠実な取引が信用を呼ぶ。無駄遣いは控えよ。
omikuji.text_en: Business is going well. Honest transactions build trust. Refrain from wasteful spending.

omikuji.text_jp: 今は苦しくとも春は来る。希望を失うな。小さな工夫が効く。
omikuji.text_en: Though hard now, spring will come. Do not lose hope. Small ingenuity helps.

omikuji.text_jp: 新しいことに手を出すのは吉。ただし準備を怠るな。
omikuji.text_en: It's auspicious to try something new, but do not neglect preparation.

omikuji.text_jp: 健康運良し。規則正しい生活が吉。軽い運動を続けよ。
omikuji.text_en: Good health luck. Regular lifestyle is auspicious. Continue light exercise.

omikuji.text_jp: 協調性が運を呼ぶ。職場や団体での立場向上あり。争いは避けよ。
omikuji.text_en: Cooperation brings fortune. Your standing at work or groups will improve. Avoid quarrels.

omikuji.text_jp: 不用意な発言が争いを生む。沈黙も時には良し。謝罪は早めに。
omikuji.text_en: Careless words spawn conflict. Silence can be good at times. Apologize promptly.

omikuji.text_jp: 細心の注意が吉を招く。夜道や金銭には気をつけよ。
omikuji.text_en: Carefulness invites luck. Be careful on night roads and with money.

omikuji.text_jp: 助け合いが運を開く。困っている者に手を差し伸べよ。
omikuji.text_en: Mutual help opens fortune. Lend a hand to those in need.

omikuji.text_jp: 技術や手仕事に吉。習得には時間を要すが後に大きな実を結ぶ。
omikuji.text_en: Good for technical skills and crafts. It takes time to master, but will yield great results later.

omikuji.text_jp: 心安らかに日々を過ごせ。対人運、金運ともに良好。家族の幸せが最優先。
omikuji.text_en: Spend your days peacefully. Good interpersonal and financial fortune. Family happiness is paramount.

omikuji.text_jp: 変化は小さく始まる。心の準備をしておけ。焦らず徐々に。
omikuji.text_en: Change begins small. Prepare your heart. Gradually, without haste.

omikuji.text_jp: 恋愛は控えめが吉。相手を尊重すれば関係は深まる。
omikuji.text_en: Modesty in love is auspicious. Respecting your partner deepens the relationship.

omikuji.title_jp: [凶]故きを温ね新しきを知れ
omikuji.title_en: Curse]Revisit the Old, Learn the New
omikuji.text_jp: 過去の教訓を忘れるな。新しい手法も取り入れよ。油断大敵。
omikuji.text_en: Don't forget lessons from the past. Also adopt new methods. Do not be complacent.

omikuji.text_jp: 実直な行いが信頼を築く。小さな善行を積み重ねよ。出会いは良好。
omikuji.text_en: Honest actions build trust. Accumulate small good deeds. Encounters are favorable.

omikuji.title_en: Great Curse]Do Not Forget the Alarm
omikuji.text_jp: 重大な用心を要す。無理をせず、身の回りを整えよ。特に金銭と人間関係に注意。
omikuji.text_en: Serious caution required. Do not overextend; put your affairs in order. Pay particular attention to finances and relationships.
